name: Ivanoile ~ Christalixeur Corruption
description:
Haley, an orphan.
Ivanoile, a Christalixeur.
Their own Corruption.
The Christalixeur’s Corruption.

Features

  • "Ivanoile ~ Christalixeur Corruption" is a story in an episodic format.
  • It contains two type of Quick Time Events and simple battles.
  • It also got Steam Achievements.
  • Oh and a cameo from Iliana ("Divine D.I.V.A."), Chiko ("Hack the Core") and Aimé ("A.L.A.N.: Rift Breakers") + bonus story after completation.
  • Dual Language Screen!
  • Approx. 10.000 words.
